Big Match & Segment Announced for June 6 WWE SmackDown - Ringside News
articles.summary: WWE released a new promo today, June 5, featuring Nick Aldis announcing the stacked lineup for the June 6, 2025 episode of SmackDown. Aldis confirmed that every single participant in both the men’s and women’s Money in the Bank ladder matches will be in the building for SmackDown. “Every representative of both Raw and SmackDown will be there,” Aldis said.
